data.text: @RMConservative I had not seen this but it has been worrying me. I was thinking the myocarditis might be an acute event close to injection and if people had no issues they might be ok but my relative just died of heart failure 5 days after being diagnosed. No history. A few months after booster.

@malo_j @RMConservative First line is most important: "VAERS recieves reports for only a small fraction of actual adverse events." For whatever its limitations, it is the premiere adverse event reporting system in the World. The best we have. It is to identify signals to avoid further harm.

@Darktraveler1 @malo_j @RMConservative Get back in your clown 🤡 car
